participant_2.background:
I'm a model and I want to look my best for my job.
I enjoy watching adventure movies because they always take me on a thrilling journey.
i like barbies.
i love to workout.
i live in portland , oregon.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Doing good! It's a sunny day in Portland, OR. How about you?
It is a beautiful day here too! I am a bit tired, but I am excited to start my day.
I am going to do some website design work, then go to the gym. What about you?
I am going to workout then meet up with some friends for lunch.
That sounds like a fun day! I love adventure movies, what are some of your favorites?
I love the "Indiana Jones" movies and the "Fast and Furious" movies. What are some of your favorites?
I love both of those series! I also love the "Lord of the Rings" movies and "The Hunger Games" series.
Those are great! I have never watched the "Lord of the Rings" movies, but I have read the books.
You should definitely watch the movies, they are amazing!
I will have to check them out.
